review: Works really well and is very responsive to your 'casting' - but understand how this works before you buy it.  It is not pre-loaded with software to stream stuff or anything like that.  You install the software on your smart device - tablet, phone, laptop - and then play the thing you want to view from a list of accepted media players (Hulu, Netflix, Youtube are the most popular currently).THEN you hit a little button that 'casts' the image from your media player onto your TV, through the dongle.I'm a fan.  Turned my 3 year old 50" RCA into a smart TV with my phone.
